alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden, central Leon and southwestern Grady Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee Comm College, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor Flooding due to heavy rain and Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flood impacts including roadway ponding are expected. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Tallahassee, Havana, Florida A and M, Midway, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Darsey, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Scotland, Jamieson, Iamonia, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella and Tallahassee Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
